0111010111100101 1101011001110001 1 -> sum: 0100110001010111, cout: 1

0011101111010110 0010010010111111 0 -> sum: 0110000010010101, cout: 0
0011110110111111 0101100110100011 0 -> sum: 1001011101100010, cout: 0
0110001101110100 1100010001001101 0 -> sum: 0010011111000001, cout: 1
1010010100000011 1000101101000101 1 -> sum: 0011000001001001, cout: 1
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
